question:
Consider the following statements about the recently launched “Stree Swabhimaan” project:
  1. It is an initiative under the Ministry of Women and Child Development
  2. It aims to ensure gender neutral and healthy working environment for women in the country
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. It is an initiative under the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u>. The “Stree Swabhimaan” project aims to create a sustainable model for providing adolescent girls and women of the country an access to affordable sanitary products by leveraging common service centres (CSCs). Under the “Stree Swabhimaan” project sanitary napkin micro manufacturing units are being set up at CSCs across India, particularly those operated by women entrepreneurs.
